function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of SBS symptoms due to high air temperature exceeding 22°C","Impact":"Impacts occupant health and comfort, leading to decreased productivity and satisfaction","Mitigation":"Adjust air temperature to maintain a comfortable range and monitor SBS symptoms","Technologies":"HVAC systems, temperature sensors, and indoor air quality monitors","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Facility management and building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of exposure to natural light affecting mood, sleep quality, and vitamin D levels","Impact":"Negative impact on mental and physical health of occupants","Mitigation":"Maximize access to natural light and provide supplemental lighting as needed","Technologies":"Daylighting systems, smart windows, and lighting controls","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Architects, designers, and facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate access to natural views contributing to job stress in office workers","Impact":"Increased stress and negative mental state among office workers","Mitigation":"Design spaces with access to natural views, green spaces, and natural landscapes","Technologies":"Natural view planning, green space integration, and biophilic design","People":"Office workers","Owner":"Architects, designers, and employers"}]}
